Title: mapExists([func,], map)
Description: Returns 1 if at least one key-value pair in map exists for which func(key, value) returns something other than 0. Otherwise, it returns 0.

NotemapExists is a higher-order function.
You can pass a lambda function to it as the first argument.
Examples: SELECT mapExists((k, v) -> (v = 1), map('k1', 1, 'k2', 2)) AS res
